lyrics:
Rockinâ€™ Robin Lyrics[Intro]
Tweedily deedily dee, tweedily deedily dee
Tweedily deedily dee, tweedily deedily dee
Tweedily deedily dee, tweedily deedily dee
Tweet, tweet, tweet, tweet

[Pre-Chorus]
He rocks in the tree tops all day long
Hopping and a-bopping and singing his song
All the little birdies on Jaybird Street
Love to hear the robin go tweet tweet tweet

[Chorus]
Rockin' robin, rock rock
Rockin' robin
Blow, rockin' robin
'Cause we're really gonna rock tonight
[Verse 1]
Every little swallow, every chick-a-dee
Every little bird in the tall oak tree
The wise old owl, the big black crow
Flapping their wings singing, "Go, bird, go"

[Chorus]
Rockin' robin, rock rock
Rockin' robin
Blow, rockin' robin
'Cause we're really going to rock tonight
Yeah, yeah!

[Verse 2]
Pretty little raven at the bird-band stand
Taught him how to do the bop and it was grand
They started going steady and bless my soul
He out-bopped the Buzzard and the Oriole

[Pre-Chorus]
He rocks in the tree tops all day long
Hopping and a-bopping and singing his song
All the little birdies on Jaybird Street
Love to hear the robin go tweet tweet tweet

[Chorus]
Rockin' robin (Tweet, tweedily dee), rock, rock
Rockin' robin (Tweet, tweedily dee)
Blow, rockin' robin
'Cause we're really gonna rock tonight
[Verse 2]
Pretty little raven at the bird-band stand
Taught him how to do the bop and it was grand
They started going steady and bless my soul
He out-bopped the Buzzard and the Oriole

[Pre-Chorus]
He rocks in the tree tops all day long
Hopping and a-bopping and singing his song
All the little birdies on Jaybird Street
Love to hear the robin go tweet tweet tweet

[Chorus]
Rockin' robin (Tweet, tweedily dee), rock, rock
Rockin' robin (Tweet, tweedily dee)
Blow, rockin' robin
'Cause we're really gonna rock tonight

[Outro]
Tweedily deedily dee, tweedily deedily dee
Tweedily deedily dee, tweedily deedily dee
Tweedily deedily dee, tweedily deedily dee
Tweet, tweet4Embed
